prompts: Create a bat-like Pokemon with purple wings and red accents that glides through the night.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a scorpion with large claws and a sleek, gray body.
Generate a flying Pokemon with sharp fangs and bright yellow eyes, perfect for stealth attacks.
Make a desert-dwelling Pokemon that has both ground and flying features, with a rugged appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique blend of bat and scorpion traits, showcasing agility and power.
Design a Pokemon that has a mix of gray and black colors, equipped with impressive claws and wings.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of both the ground and flying types with striking features.
